thread.title: Great value and location
thread.title_full: Great value and location - Review of The Marmara Manhattan, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: RarePhotoGallery
title: Great value and location
text:
For the price the size cannot be beat. I'm used to closet spaces midtown for 50-75% more, had a lovely full apartment in a great neighborhood good restaurants and all I needed, groceries, pharmacy parking etc. The 96 St Q line is very convenient to get the times Square and all over. My new 'Go To' spot for Manhattan. Staff were very friendly and helpful too!
Room Tip: Corner suites have balconies See more room tips
